sentence.Network_en: Ability to think will accrue to you from good habits of study.
sentence.Network_cn: 思考能力将因良好的学习习惯而自然增强.

sentence.Network_en: Knowledge will accrue to you from reading.
Officials say the options will offer investors a longer time in which to accrue profits.
sentence.Network_cn: 官员说这些期权会给投资者提供更长的利润积累期。

词根及词缀 ... agon 打斗，竞赛） accrue 增长） termite n 白蚁（直接来自拉丁文.
7-14 累而不眠_在线英语听力室 ... 3. consecutive 连续的 4. accrue 获得；积累 5. adrenaline [生化] 肾上腺素.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French acreue, past participle of acreistre 'increase', from Latin accrescere 'become larger' (see accrete)

entry.def: If money or interest accrues or if you accrue it, it gradually increases in amount over a period of time.

example.ex: I owed £5,000 — part of this was accrued interest...
example.tran: 我欠款5,000英镑，其中一部分是累计的利息。

example.ex: If you do not pay within 28 days, interest will accrue...
example.tran: 如果28天之内不付款，就会自然生息。

entry.def: If things such as profits or benefits accrue to someone, they are added to over a period of time.

example.tran: 希望利润会增加的期待

example.ex: ...a project from which considerable benefit will accrue to the community...
example.tran: 使社区持续受益的项目

sentences.sentence: "The house accrued to the oldest son"

auth_sentence.content: The benefits will accrue in a multi-faceted manner.
auth_sentence.res_content: The benefits will accrue in a multi-faceted manner.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The benefits will accrue in a multi-faceted manner.

auth_sentence.content: Interest continues to accrue on deferred payments.
auth_sentence.res_content: Interest continues to accrue on deferred payments.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Interest continues to accrue on deferred payments.

auth_sentence.content: Sunsets accrue a haunting metaphorical resonance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sunsets accrue a haunting metaphorical resonance.

Sentence.sentence: To classify parenting as a personal choice for which there is no collective responsibility is not merely to ignore the social benefits of good parenting; really, it is to steal those benefits because they accrue (不断积累) to the whole of society as today's children become tomorrow's productive citizenry (公民).

means.word_mean: 增加, 增长, (利息等的自然)滋生, 增加

sentences.en: Interest accrues on a bank accout.
sentences.cn: 银行账户的利息在增长。

sentences.en: The company had accrued debts of over 1000 yuan.
sentences.cn: 该公司已积欠了1000多万元的债务。

sentences.en: Ability to think will accrue to you from good habits of study.
sentences.cn: 有了良好的学习习惯，你的思考能力就自然会有所增强。

sentences.en: A cause of action has accrued when the right to sue has become vested.
sentences.cn: 起诉的理由在控告权被赋予后随之存在。

sentences.en: I have accrued a set of commemoration stamps.
sentences.cn: 我已收集一套纪念邮票。
